alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Boundary, northwestern Bonner and northeastern Pend Oreille Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 359 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 37 miles northeast of Colville to 8 miles southeast of Nordman. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nordman, Metaline Falls, Beaver Creek Campground, Sullivan Lake Campground, Coolin, and Noisy Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
